adv:
- may quickly see patterns from related views that you wouldn't have thought to create plots for
- good for quick exploratory data analysis
disadv:
- no sorting/filtering options
- can't specify dimension/axis order
- can't specify plot type (box+whisker would have been helpful for tasks)
- size too small or not scaled correctly for some larger plots
comment: the recommendation system would have been much more helpful if sorting/filtering/axis-order/plot-type was allowed to change; sometimes I see possible interesting insights/trends being recommended, but the figures are too hard to read
